pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.4: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.7: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.8: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:9.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:10.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:10.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṃ na desessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:11.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:11.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:11.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:11.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:12.1: “Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:13.2: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ, paṇṇacchattaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:14.2: buddhabhāsito sāvakabhāsito isibhāsito devatābhāsito atthūpasañhito dhammūpasañhito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:15.2: padena deseti, pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk57:15.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
